snippet: The drug Perjeta is meant to be used with the company’s drug called Herceptin to treat the disease its advanced stages.
abstract: Genentech wins federal approval for Perjeta, a new drug to treat advanced breast cancer; company announces that it is expecting manufacturing problems that could lead to a shortage of the drug.
lead_paragraph: The drug Perjeta is meant to be used with the company’s drug called Herceptin to treat the disease its advanced stages.

headline.seo: Genentech Wins Approval For New Breast Cancer Drug
headline.main: Genentech Wins Approval for New Breast Cancer Drug
headline.print_headline: Genentech Breast Cancer Drug Wins Approval
